metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3824 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: The MPEG4Extractor::parseChunk function in MPEG4Extractor.cpp inlibstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I does not properly restrictsize addition, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code orcause a denial of service (integer overflow and memory corruption) via acrafted MPEG-4 tx3g atom, aka internal bug 20923261.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
